titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of a joint resolution (H. J. Res. 132) designating April 24, 1987, as "National Day of Remembrance of the Armenian Genocide of 1915-1923".

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-264.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Failed of Passage in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 189 - 201 (Record Vote No: 312).

bill.summary: 8/3/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.J. Res. 132 (National Day of Remembrance of the Armenian Genocide of 1915-1923).
